title: Divine Interruption
summary: A cityâ€™s silence after the breach. The blue-lit server room, empty as a chapel at midnight.
fragment: She prays for the connection to return. Outside, the streetlights flicker like candles.
plain_explanation: A cyberattack disrupted communications. The digital world feels sacred and fragile.

title: Psalm of Loss
summary: A lost message. A vanished account. The code remembers what we forget.
fragment: Not every prayer is answered. Some are stored in backup, unread.
plain_explanation: A data breach or deletion event. Some information is lost, some hidden.

title: Confession in the Cloud
summary: She uploads her secrets. The cloud keeps them, or lets them go.
fragment: Files drift like incense. Somewhere, a server is burning.
plain_explanation: Sensitive data was uploaded to the cloud. Security is uncertain.
